songs.title: I Have a Gun
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: PolitikZ]
Yeah!
It's ya boy!
Y'all ain't ready for this one!

[Chorus: PolitikZ]
I have a gun
Y'all tryna fuck with me?!
I got a gun! (Haha)
And y'all tryna fuck with me?!
I got a gun
Pop pop!
I got a gun
Pop pop!
(Prra, prra, prra, prra, prra!)
A gun
I got a gun
I'mma kill your whole family
Don't fuck with me

[Verse: PolitikZ]
I got a gun
Who the fuck you think you is bitch!
I got a gun, boy, I get your mama's business
This ain't a gold plate, watch where the wrist flick
I'mma shoot your head in front of your wife's and kids bitch
Oooh
I shot kids in the preschool
Yeaah
I shot five kids in the preschool
Yeah
I shot five kids from my high-school
Yeah
I shot five kids from my college

[Chorus: PolitikZ]
Pop pop!
I got a gun!
I just shot three children, I just shot three children
I got a gun (uuuh)
I got a gun, I got a gun
I got a gun, I got a gun
I said I got a gun! I got a gun
Where ya at, homie? Where ya at?
Where ya at? I said where ya at?
Don't fuck with me! (don't fuck!)
I got a gun!
I got a gun!
